title: Natural World - 206 Eps Up To Sep 2014 - Wildlife - Xvid - Slimo
description:
Natural World - Wildlife - Xvid - Slimoo

 




[b]Since last posting of this torrent
13 More eps added
25+ files upgraded in quality - New Recordings

Unlikely any more updates until 2015
 

[/b]




Natural World is a nature documentary television series broadcast annually on BBC and regarded by the BBC as its flagship natural history brand.

 It is currently the longest-running series in its genre on British television, with more than 400 episodes broadcast since its inception in 1983


 
 
 <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Natural_World_(TV_series)" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Natural_World_(TV_series)</a>

 
 


===================== Important Read =====================

[b]





Search every few months for Natural World Slimoo

Natural World is a yearly series with old eps repeated 
When this torrent is reposted it will either have new eps, or upgrades, or both
 
You will download faster by seeding older versions of this torrent
 
A: More will want to connect to you as you have files they want 
 
B: More of the old files you are seeding, the less I need to seed.
 
You seeding older versions I only need to seed about 25GB
You not seeding I'll need to seed the WHOLE torrent.
Not an issue but you will have to wait 4 times longer
 

[/b]

=================================================

Not all these rips are mine so thanks to the original posters

[b]All files 700mb (98 files) are MY rips[/b]

Because the rest are capped by so many people, there were issues
I have tried to fix these as best as I can so the files kinda match up.


Naming:
Many posters used the year not S00 - E00
Problem there is they don't play in order
1999 - Apes will play before 1999 - Baboons
Even if Baboons was aired months before

Worst example
1999 - Apes
2000 - Zebra
These might have actually been a week apart
But year naming can be 32 eps apart in listing
 

[b]Natural World - S33 - E01 - Africa's Giant Killers Because this ep was broadcast January 2014 many other posters have wrongly called it E01 when it is (BBC Website) E10 - This has lead to most posters naming ALL Series 33 one number out on all eps[/b]

 


Other issues
Formats - Divx to mkv = Now all Xvid
Ratio Some Wide-screen some not = Now All Wide-screen
Black Borders - Top, Bottom, Sides = Now removed
VHS tracking lines = Now Cropped out
Audio Volumes - From Very Hi to Very Low = Now about the same

Announcer end credits - Some telling you about next weeks ep
(Problem is the next weeks ep might be missing - So removed)




Naming of files comes from the Wiki page <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Natural_World_episodes" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Natural_World_episodes</a>
 

============= What's In This Torrent =============

[b]


Natural World - 195 eps
1 Extra 



Note (Some of the later eps in this torrent can be found in HD elsewhere)
